profile_summary:
Dynamic and detail-oriented Senior R&D Engineer with 8 years of experience in Full Stack Development and a proven record in crafting high-performance solutions. Proficient in **C++**, **C**, and **GIT**, I excel in electronics design and thrive in collaborative team environments, leveraging strong problem-solving and communication skills. My extensive background in cloud technologies, enterprise application development, and compliance standards enhances my capability to deliver robust engineering solutions.

Specializing in modern web technologies, I also bring expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. I have successfully led projects that integrate predictive analytics and intelligent automation while ensuring alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience with microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD processes further empowers my contributions in the R&D space.
